about_the_game:
Ultimate Bundle for Idle Wasteland.
Contains:
The All-Rounder - +200 Armor Penetration, +50 Minimum Damage, +10% Auto-Salvage and Auto-Catch chance
Uranium Hammer - -30% Scrap Costs, +10% Triple Craft Chance
Golden Loot Drone - +2 Nuclear Material and +2 Items from every Loot Drone, 2x Steam Points from all sources
Bonus: 525 Nuclear Material, 6 Super Skill Points
